executeUpgrade(((address,uint8,bool,byte.details: Only the ChainTypeManager contract can execute the upgrade

params._diamondCut: The diamond cut parameters to be executed

forwardedBridgeBurn(address,address,byte.details: Similar to IL1AssetHandler interface, used to send chains.

forwardedBridgeConfirmTransferResult(uin.details: Similar to IL1AssetHandler interface, used to claim failed chain transfers.

forwardedBridgeMint(bytes,bool).details: Similar to IL1AssetHandler interface, used to receive chains.

freezeDiamond().details: Only the governance mechanism may freeze Diamond Proxy

makePermanentRollup().details: This is a security feature needed for chains that should be trusted to keep their data available even if the chain admin becomes malicious and tries to set the DA validator pair to something which does not publish DA to Ethereum.DANGEROUS: once activated, there is no way back!

setDAValidatorPair(address,uint8).details: While in principle it is possible that updating only one of the values is needed, usually these should work in pair and L1 validator typically expects a specific input from the L2 Validator. That's why we change those together to prevent admins of chains from shooting themselves in the foot.

params._l1DAValidator: The address of the L1 DA validator
params._l2DACommitmentScheme: The scheme of the L2 DA commitment

params._zkPorterIsAvailable: The availability of zk porter shard

params._newPriorityTxMaxGasLimit: The maximum number of L2 gas that a user can request for L1 -> L2 transactions

unfreezeDiamond().details: Only the CTM can unfreeze Diamond Proxy

params._cutData: The diamond cut parameters that is executed in the upgrade
params._protocolVersion: The current protocol version from which upgrade is executed

acceptAdmin().notice: Accepts transfer of admin rights. Only pending admin can accept the role.

changeFeeParams((uint8,uint32,uint32,uin.notice: Change the fee params for L1->L2 transactions

freezeDiamond().notice: Instantly pause the functionality of all freezable facets & their selectors

getRollupDAManager().notice: Returns address of the RollupDAManager of the ZK Chain.

makePermanentRollup().notice: Makes the chain as permanent rollup.

pauseDepositsBeforeInitiatingMigration().notice: Pauses deposits before initiating migration to the Gateway.

setDAValidatorPair(address,uint8).notice: Set the L1 DA validator address as well as the L2 DA commitment scheme.

setPendingAdmin(address).notice: Starts the transfer of admin rights. Only the current admin can propose a new pending one.New admin can accept admin rights by calling `acceptAdmin` function.

setPriorityTxMaxGasLimit(uint256).notice: Change the max L2 gas limit for L1 -> L2 transactions

setPubdataPricingMode(uint8).notice: Change the pubdata pricing mode before the first batch is processed

setTokenMultiplier(uint128,uint128).notice: Change the token multiplier for L1->L2 transactions

setValidator(address,bool).notice: Change validator status (active or not active)

unfreezeDiamond().notice: Unpause the functionality of all freezable facets & their selectors

unpauseDeposits().notice: Unpauses deposits, used after the chain is initialized

upgradeChainFromVersion(uint256,((addres.notice: Perform the upgrade from the current protocol version with the corresponding upgrade data

documentation.text: @notice Accepts transfer of admin rights. Only pending admin can accept the role.

@notice Change zk porter availability
 @param _zkPorterIsAvailable The availability of zk porter shard

@notice Change the max L2 gas limit for L1 -> L2 transactions
 @param _newPriorityTxMaxGasLimit The maximum number of L2 gas that a user can request for L1 -> L2 transactions

@notice Change the fee params for L1->L2 transactions
 @param _newFeeParams The new fee params
@notice Change the token multiplier for L1->L2 transactions

@notice Change the pubdata pricing mode before the first batch is processed
 @param _pricingMode The new pubdata pricing mode
@notice Set the transaction filterer
@notice Allow EVM emulation on chain

@notice Instantly pause the functionality of all freezable facets & their selectors
 @dev Only the governance mechanism may freeze Diamond Proxy

@notice Unpause the functionality of all freezable facets & their selectors
 @dev Only the CTM can unfreeze Diamond Proxy
@notice Returns address of the RollupDAManager of the ZK Chain.
@notice Porter availability status changes
@notice Validator's status changed

@notice pendingAdmin is changed
 @dev Also emitted when new admin is accepted and in this case, `newPendingAdmin` would be zero address
@notice Admin changed
@notice Priority transaction max L2 gas limit changed
@notice Fee params for L1->L2 transactions changed
@notice Validium mode status changed
@notice The transaction filterer has been updated
@notice BaseToken multiplier for L1->L2 transactions changed
@notice Emitted when an upgrade is executed.
@notice Emitted when the migration to the new settlement layer is complete.
@notice Emitted when the contract is frozen.
@notice Emitted when the contract is unfrozen.
@notice The EVM emulator has been enabled
@notice New L2 DA commitment scheme set
@notice Pauses deposits before initiating migration to the Gateway.
@notice Unpauses deposits, used after the chain is initialized
@dev Similar to IL1AssetHandler interface, used to send chains.
@dev Similar to IL1AssetHandler interface, used to claim failed chain transfers.
@dev Similar to IL1AssetHandler interface, used to receive chains.
